feed.title: k1tch0p's Blog
feed.subtitle: A blog about cybersecurity, penetration testing, and ethical hacking. Follow my journey as I explore the world of security and share my insights.

entry.title: HTB Code
entry.summary: OS: üêß Linux Difficulty: Easy Points: 20 Author: FisMatHack Code starts by exploiting an RCE in a Python Code Editor web app by using a Python Jail Bypass. Once we have the foothold and after files inspection, we find a databas file with users creds, that we crack to move laterally. For the privesc, the user has permissions to a backup utility script, to be exploited via a path traversal vulne...

entry.title: HTB Cypher
entry.summary: OS: üêß Linux Difficulty: Medium Points: 40 Author: Techromancer Cypher is focused on a cypher injection flaw granting a shell as neo4j. A history file leaks credentials for graphasm, who can run bbot as root. Privilege escalation is achieved by abusing a custom bbot module to execute arbitrary commands. Foothold We start by a scan for open ports using Nmap: Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.57...
